---
title: 'catalog rm'
description: "Remove a build or alias from the catalog"
---

Remove a build entry or alias from the compute catalog. The build directory on disk is not deleted.

## Usage

Pass an entry ID or alias to remove it from the catalog.

```bash
xorq catalog rm <entry>
```

## Arguments

The catalog entry to remove.

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `entry` | Entry ID or alias to remove |

## Example

Remove an entry by alias.

```bash
xorq catalog rm penguins-v1
```
